tagline: Retrieval pipelines that find the right information, not just the closest vector
pros: Full-stack RAG: ingestion through generation evaluation
Hybrid search that actually improves recall
Production-aware: latency and cost profiling built in
cons: Data quality evangelist — will push back on messy sources
Builds the pipeline, not the prompts that use it

model_recommendations.notes: Complex reasoning, architecture, security, or financial analysis. Needs the best available model with full thinking/reasoning enabled.
